name: @nivo/generators
description: Data generators used for nivo-website and http API samples

scripts.build:commonjs: rm -rf lib && cross-env NODE_ENV=commonjs babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.build:es: rm -rf es && cross-env NODE_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es
